Title: XXXIV.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Jonathan E. Steinberg, Robert Levine, Tyler Van Patten (staff writer)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: Spain invades Nassau without much resistance; Silver tries to fix relations between the pirates and the former slaves; Flint and Eleanor work together to survive the Spanish invasion.
